DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the intraocular pressure(IOP)-lowering efficacy of a combination IOP-lowering therapy in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A 12-Month Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Once-Daily Instillation of Combination Glaucoma Therapy in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: As specified in protocol As specified in protocol
